description: The princess of a feudal country called Nihon who sends the ninja Kurogane on the quest that causes him to join the dimension travelers. Tomoyo is the Tsukuyomi, a powerful miko sorceress responsible for maintaining the wards of Nihon that protect the country from demons. She is also a dreamseer with the ability to see into other people`s, to enter another`s dreams, can send trans-dimensional messages through dreams and is able to see the future in her dreams. However, she gave up her dreamseer power to Yuuko as the price for bringing Kurogane, Fay, Shaoran and Mokona to Nihon. Another incarnation of her appears In Piffle World, where she retains much of her nature from Daidouji Tomoyo in Cardcaptor Sakura.
name: Tomoyo
